snippet: Randolph Herr says he can’t find middle C with a flashlight, but he is renowned for repairing, restoring and making sweet music with player pianos.
abstract: Corey Kilgannon Character Study column on Randolph Herr, an aficionado of player pianos living in Canarsie, Brooklyn; Herr is renowned for repairing, restoring and playing the pianos, using levers to manipulate the speed, loudness and dynamics of the instrument.
lead_paragraph: Randolph Herr says he can’t find middle C with a flashlight, but he is renowned for repairing, restoring and making sweet music with player pianos.

headline.seo: Randolph Herr, 64, Maestro of the Player Piano
headline.main: Pulling Levers to Play the Piano
headline.print_headline: Pulling Levers to Play the Piano
